summary: A follower wearing daedric armor and equipped with a daedric sword, some arrows (1000) and a daedric bow.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION
__________________________________________
A follower wearing daedric armor and equipped with an daedric sword(over 150000 damage), some arrows (1000) and a daedric bow. This follower is positioned at Breezehouse at whiterun. Just ask him to follow you. Thank you. He is now 2 times bigger than you. To install the update, uninstall the previous version and install the new version.

Installation
__________________________________________
Nexus Mod Mananger
1) Click download with NMM.

Manual Installation
1) Download the file.
2) Extract the file
3) Copy/Move the file to your Skyrim/Data directory


Version 1.1
______________
A follower wearing daedric armor and equipped with a daedric sword, some arrows (1000) and a daedric bow.

Version 1.2
______________
A follower(2x your size) wearing daedric armor and equipped with a daedric sword(over 15000 damage), some arrows (1000) and a daedric bow.
Visit this website for game reviews
_________________________________
http://blackrapgames.host-ed.me/
author: XGhostSlayer
